select
from si_material where dr = 1 and material_no like '%' #{mno,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' and material_name like '%' #{mname,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' and material_model like '%' #{mmodel,jdbcType=CHAR} '%' order by create_time desc
